languages.text: Simple single attack with this weapon deals additional (5% of target’s max HP) direct damage.

traits.locale_text: Simple single attack with this weapon deals additional (5% of target’s max HP) direct damage.

languages.text: This weapon's single-target attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> (up to a maximum of 300).
languages.original_text: Одиночные атаки этим оружием наносят дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный <u>5% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} цели</u> (не может быть больше 300).

traits.locale_text: This weapon's single-target attacks deal an additional direct damage equal to <u>5% of target's maximum wounds</u>.

This weapon's single-target attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> (up to a maximum of 300).

This weapon's single-target attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> (up to a maximum of 300).

languages.text: Bu silahın tek hedefli saldırıları, <u>hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %5'i</u> kadar (en fazla 300 puan) ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: This weapon's single-target attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> (up to a maximum of 300).

traits.locale_text: Bu silahın tek hedefli saldırıları, <u>hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %5'i</u> kadar (en fazla 300 puan) ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} verir.
Bu silahın tek hedefli saldırıları, <u>hedefin maksimum sağlık puanının %5'i</u> kadar (en fazla 300 puan) ilave doğrudan hasar verir.

languages.text: Los ataques de esta arma contra un solo objetivo infligen tanto {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} adicional como el <u>5 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del objetivo</u> (hasta un máximo de 300).
languages.original_text: This weapon's single-target attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> (up to a maximum of 300).

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de esta arma contra un solo objetivo infligen tanto daño directo adicional como el <u>5 % de las heridas máximas del objetivo</u> (hasta un máximo de 300).

languages.text: 这把武器的单体攻击命中目标时，会额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，等同于<u>目标{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的5%</u>（不超过300）。
languages.original_text: This weapon's single-target attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> (up to a maximum of 300).

traits.locale_text: 这把武器的单体攻击命中目标时，会额外造成直击伤害，等同于<u>目标最大生命值的5%</u>（不超过300）。

languages.text: Les attaques à cible unique de cette arme infligent des {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} supplémentaires égaux à <u>5 % des {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de la cible</u> (jusqu'à 300 au maximum).
languages.original_text: This weapon's single-target attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> (up to a maximum of 300).

traits.locale_text: Les attaques à cible unique de cette arme infligent des dégâts directs supplémentaires égaux à <u>5 % des blessures maximum de la cible</u> (jusqu'à 300 au maximum).

languages.text: この武器の単体攻撃では、<u>ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の5%</u>と同じ追加の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える（最大300）。
languages.original_text: This weapon's single-target attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> (up to a maximum of 300).

traits.locale_text: この武器の単体攻撃では、<u>ターゲットの最大の傷の5%</u>と同じ追加の直接ダメージを与える（最大300）。
この武器の単体攻撃では、<u>ターゲットの最大の傷の5%</u>と同じ追加の直接ダメージを与える（最大300）。

languages.text: Die Einzelziel-Angriffe dieser Waffe verursachen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direkten Schaden{/g} in Höhe von <u>5 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels</u> (max. 300).

traits.locale_text: Die Einzelziel-Angriffe dieser Waffe verursachen zusätzlichen direkten Schaden in Höhe von <u>5 % der maximalen Wunden des Ziels</u> (max. 300).

traits.locale_text: Одиночные атаки этим оружием наносят дополнительный прямой урон, равный <u>5% от максимального здоровья цели</u> (не может быть больше 300).
Одиночные атаки этим оружием наносят дополнительный прямой урон, равный <u>5% от максимального здоровья цели</u> (не может быть больше 300).
